Class Base64

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.pki.gbay.crypto.texts.Base64
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EncodedTextInterface

    public class Base64
extends java.lang.Object
implements EncodedTextInterface
    Generates a base64 encoded object
    Author:
    Araz

      • Base64

        public Base64(java.lang.String encodedText)
        If you want to generate a Base64 object from an encoded text you need to use String

        Otherwise use arrays of Byte Generate BASE64 object from a base64 encoded text

        Parameters:
        encodedText - base64 encoded String
        See Also:
